property_title: Panorama Magawish, Apartment two-bedrooms 75 Sqm for sale
property_description:
Welcome to Panorama Magawish

Discover an exclusive real estate development that blends sophistication, comfort, and convenience. Located atEl Bahga Squarein Magawish, Panorama Magawish spans a generous2000 sqmand offers a lifestyle that meets every expectation.

Prime Location

Situated in the heart of Magawish, our development offers a vibrant urban experience and a peaceful residential atmosphere. Residents gain immediate access to city amenities while relishing the calm of a secure community. In short, they experience the best of both worlds.

Exceptional Features

We meticulously plan every detail to enhance your living experience. Our premium features include:

  • Swimming Pool:Dive into our state-of-the-art pool, perfect for relaxation and social gatherings.
  • 24/7 Security:We install advanced security systems so you and your family live in a safe environment.
  • Satellite Connectivity:Stay connected with our cutting-edge satellite services that support modern lifestyles.

Flexible Payment Plans

We recognize that every investor’s needs differ. Therefore, we offer two attractive payment plans designed to make your investment simple and affordable:

  • Plan A:Start with a20% down paymentand complete the balance over2 years.
  • Plan B:Begin with a30% down paymentand pay the balance overtwo and a half years.
  • Maintenance fee 5%

These plans allow you to secure your stake in one of Magawish’s most promising developments while keeping your finances flexible.

Delivery Timeline

Mark your calendars, as we plan to completePanorama MagawishinDecember 2026. We ensure timely delivery and superior construction standards so you can move in quickly or start generating returns on your investment.

Why Invest in Panorama Magawish?

  • Strategic Location:Benefit from a prime spot at El Bahga Square, Magawish.
  • Premium Amenities:Enjoy luxury features such as a swimming pool, robust security, and reliable satellite connectivity.
  • Attractive Payment Options:Choose a payment plan that fits your financial strategy.
  • Future-Ready Investment:Secure your future with a project set for completion in December 2026.

Act Now

If you value luxury living and smart investments, choose Panorama Magawish today. Contact us to learn more about this exclusive real estate opportunity and secure your future home.

Invest smart. Live luxuriously. Welcome to Panorama Magawish.

property_title: Hurghada Heights, Apartment two bedroom 94 Sqm Street view for sale
property_description:
Hurghada Heights is alandmark residential and investment developmentset on6,100 sqmin the heart of the prestigiousHurghada Promenade. With a total of350 units, this community has been carefully master-planned to deliver the perfect balance of modern design, premium amenities, and flexible ownership opportunities.

Located just5 minutes from Hurghada International Airportand close to Hurghada Marina, international hotels, shopping, and entertainment, Hurghada Heights offers bothlifestyle convenienceandlong-term value growthon Egypt’s Red Sea coast.

Prime Location

  • Directly on theHurghada Promenade, the city’s most desirable coastal address.
  • 5 minutes to Hurghada Airport, ideal for international buyers and holidaymakers.
  • 10 minutes to Hurghada Marinaand city center.
  • Surrounded by luxury resorts, shopping malls, cafés, and fine dining.
  • Easy access to beaches, water sports, and year-round sunshine.

Units & Layouts

Hurghada Heights offers a mix ofStudios, 1-Bedroom, and 2-Bedroom Apartmentstailored to different needs:

  • Studios– Ideal for holiday rentals and investors.
  • 1-Bedroom Apartments– Perfect for couples and small families.
  • 2-Bedroom Apartments– Spacious layouts designed for permanent living or family retreats.

All units featuremodern architecture, open layouts, and private balconies, maximizing natural light and comfort.

Facilities & Community Features

Hurghada Heights is designed as aresort-style residential community, offering facilities that enhance comfort, leisure, and security:

  • 5 Swimming Pools, including:
    • 1 Heated Pool for all seasons
    • 2 Rooftop Pools with panoramic views
  • Modern Reception & 24/7 Security
  • Full CCTV & Surveillance System
  • Central Satellite Connectivity
  • Cafés and Restaurants
  • Retail Shops for daily needs and leisure

Every detail has been crafted to ensure that residents and investors experience the highest standards of Red Sea living.

Payment Plans

Hurghada Heights offersflexible, interest-free installment plansdesigned for both residents and international investors.

Studios

  • 30% Down Payment + Installments over 36 months
  • 40% Down Payment + Installments over 48 months

1 & 2 Bedrooms

  • 15% Down Payment + Installments over 36 months
  • 20% Down Payment + Installments over 48 months

Delivery Timeline

The project is scheduled for completion and handover

Phase 1 for buildings 1, 2 , 4 and 5 : 2027

Phase 2 for building 3: 2028

Investment Highlights

  • Prime Promenade Address– Properties here enjoy higher demand and stronger appreciation.
  • Rental Income Potential– Hurghada is one of Egypt’s leading tourist destinations with consistently high occupancy rates.
  • Modern Community of 350 Units– Balanced supply ensures exclusivity and long-term value.
  • Flexible Payment Plans– Interest-free installments up to 60 months.
  • Delivery 2027–2028– Perfect timing for investors to complete payments and plan returns.

property_title: Clan Residents Red Sea, Apartment one bedroom 73 Sqm for sale
property_description:
Clan Residents Red Sea

Clan Residents Red Sea

New Residential & Touristic Project beside Pickalbatros Hotels

Fast Facts

About the Project

Clan Residences lies in vibrantMagawish, Hurghada, only 5 minutes from Senzo Mall and 10 minutes from Downtown. Surrounded by a row of five‑star Pickalbatros resorts, the compound delivers a lifestyle of calm sophistication, natural beauty and community living.

Location Advantages

  • Walk to Pickalbatros Hotels: enjoy paid beach access, water‑parks & promenades
  • 15 min to Hurghada International Airport
  • Direct access to the coastal road for effortless trips to Sahl Hasheesh & El Gouna

Masterplan & Unit Mix

A contemporary low‑rise design (G+4) maximises pool views and cross‑ventilation. Studios, 1‑, 2‑ and 3‑bedroom layouts feature private terraces and open‑plan kitchens for modern indoor‑outdoor living. (See floor‑plan samples on pages 9‑10 of the brochure.)

Resort‑Style Amenities

  • 4 temperature‑controlledswimming pools+ sun‑deck lounges
  • 2Jacuzzisfor hydro‑therapy relaxation
  • Fully equippedgym& separatespazone
  • Kids’ areawith shaded playground & splash pad
  • Restaurants & commercial strip(cafés, fine & casual dining, retail, supermarket, pharmacy)
  • Secureparking& underground garages
  • Smart‑gate security systemwith 24/7 CCTV & access control

Flexible Payment Plan

20 % reservation→80 % equal instalmentsover 5 years
One‑timemaintenance fee 10 %upon delivery

No bank mortgage is required—payments are made directly to the developer, giving both local and international buyers a simple, low‑risk entry into the Red Sea property market.

Investment Highlights

  1. Prime Hotel Zone Address– Capitalise on year‑round tourism demand generated by neighbouring Pickalbatros resorts.
  2. High Rental Yields– Furnished units in Magawish record 9‑11 % gross yields, outperforming New Cairo & North Coast averages.
  3. Rapid Equity Growth– Hurghada’s beachfront land prices have risen c. 15 % YoY since 2022.
  4. Turn‑key Handover– Optional furniture & property‑management packages ensure effortless passive income.
  5. Developer Track Record– Backed by Pickalbatros‑affiliated expertise with on‑time delivery across the Red Sea coast.

property_title: Atlantis Resort, Studio47 sqm pool View for sale
property_description:
Discover a new benchmark in upscale residential living withAtlantis Resort, strategically nestled in the heart of Hurghada. This exceptional development spans42,000 square meters, artfully blendingmodern comfortandcastle-inspired aestheticsto create a serene, sophisticated haven on Egypt’s Red Sea coast. Below, explore the key features, prime location, and investment potential that makeAtlantis Resortan unrivaled opportunity in theHurghadareal estate market.

Prime Location with Quick Access

Atlantis Resortis centrally located indowntown Hurghada.

  • Hurghada International Airportis only five minutes away. Consequently, traveling for business or leisure becomes simple.
  • Mamsha, the city’s lively promenade, is three minutes away. Therefore, you can visit cafés, shops, and entertainment venues whenever possible.
  • Sheraton Streetis also three minutes away. Thus, you can conveniently access upscale dining and a buzzing nightlife scene.

Modern Design Inspired by Atlantis

This resort draws inspiration from the mythical city of Atlantis. However, it also merges a modern layout with castle-like towers and fortified edges. In addition, the complex dedicates60% of its 42,000-square-meter areato lush landscaping. As a result, residents can relax in green spaces and experience a sense of calm. Furthermore, the remaining 40% is devoted to well-planned buildings and amenities.

Diverse Unit Types for Every Lifestyle

  • STUDIO
  • CONDO
  • 1 Bedroom
  • 2 Bedroom
  • 3 Bedroom
  • Duplex

Perfect for singles or young professionals. Moreover, each studio maximizes space with open-plan layouts.

Ideal for a stylish getaway or a modern main residence.

These units balance privacy and comfort, especially for couples or solo travelers.

Great for small families seeking extra space.

Spacious layouts that suit larger groups or those who enjoy room to grow.

Multi-level living for anyone looking for more privacy or panoramic views.

Appealing Amenities and Features

Residents can enjoy a variety of comforts. For instance, each unit boasts high-quality finishes. Furthermore, the property includes landscaped gardens for a serene atmosphere. In addition, on-site management ensures the resort stays in top condition. Consequently, owners can benefit from well-maintained facilities and enhanced property value.


  • Flexible Payment Plan u0026amp; Delivery Date

Investing inAtlantis Resortis straightforward because of its generous payment plan.

  • Phase 1
  • Down Payment: 20%
  • Installments: Over 4 years
  • Delivery: Expected in 2027
  • Phase 2
  • Down Payment: 20%
  • Installments: Over 5 years
  • Delivery: Expected in 2028

This schedule helps spread out costs, allowing you to manage your finances with less stress. You can finalize your plans for personal or rental use before the 2026 completion date.

Why Choose Atlantis Resort?

Strategic Downtown Location
Reach significant city attractions, restaurants, and services within minutes.

Grand Yet Minimalist Design
Castle-like elements add a touch of royalty, while the overall aesthetic remains modern.

Ample Green Spaces
Over half of the property features landscaped gardens promoting a relaxing vibe.

Strong Return on Investment
Hurghada’s real estate market continues to grow, thus creating potential for attractive property values.

This Resort effortlessly blends practical living with elegant design and is conveniently situated close to beautiful beaches, bustling shopping centers, and notable landmarks such as Hurghada Museum and Sheraton Street. Consequently, residents enjoy unmatched convenience along with a superior quality of life.

Your Perfect Home Awaits

Each apartment is carefully planned with modern aesthetics and functionality in mind. Furthermore, residents can relish captivating views of the Resort’s shimmering swimming pool or the vibrant cityscape of Hurghada. property_title: Scandic Resort, Apartment two bedrooms 121 Sqm for sale
property_description:
Scandic Resort, Luxury Beachfront Living with 24/7 Five‑Star Hospitality

Quick Facts

About Scandic Resort

Scandic Resort is Hurghada’s premier destination. The development combines low-density architecture with world-class hospitality managed by a professional hotel operator. Expansive, sun-kissed terraces, floor-to-ceiling glass, and energy-efficient materials keep interiors cool, bright, and eco-friendly.

Uninterrupted Red Sea Views

Every apartment and villa is oriented toward the turquoise lagoon or the open sea. Step outside and sink your feet into an immaculate stretch of private white sand reserved solely for Scandic homeowners.

Resort‑Grade Infrastructure

Three temperature‑controlled swimming pools wind through palm‑lined gardens, while high‑speed elevators in every block ensure swift, silent access to all floors. A pool‑front restaurant serves fresh seafood and international cuisine, and the ground‑floor promenade features boutique retail, cafés, and gourmet dining.

Five‑Star Services at Your Doorstep

  • Concierge & Reception– multilingual staff on duty 24/7
  • Housekeeping & Laundry– hotel‑standard cleaning whenever you request
  • Maintenance & Repairs– on‑call technicians keep your home flawless
  • Rental & Property Management– hassle‑free short‑ or long‑term leasing to maximize ROI
  • Secure Marina– berthing services, fueling, and equipment storage for yacht owners

These services transform ownership into a hands‑off investment—perfect for international buyers seeking reliable vacation‑rental income.

Lifestyle & Community

Scandic Resort fosters a vibrant, family‑friendly atmosphere:

  • Water sports hub(diving, snorkeling, paddle boarding)
  • Kids’ club & playgroundwith certified supervisors
  • Fitness center & spawith panoramic sea views
  • Sunset loungefor social gatherings and live music
  • On‑site supermarket & pharmacyfor daily convenience

Whether you’re a digital nomad, retiree, or holiday investor, the community calendar is packed with yoga sessions, barbecue nights, and coastal clean‑up initiatives.

Floor Plans & Unit Mix

Detailed floor plans available on request.

Investment Highlights

  1. Prime Beachfront Asset– freehold title in a supply‑constrained coastal zone.
  2. High Occupancy Rates– Hurghada’s tourism CAGR exceeded 12 % over the past five years.
  3. Flexible Payment Plan– 30 % today unlocks ownership; balance spread over 3 years, interest‑free.
  4. Turnkey Rental Program– on‑site team markets, manages, and maintains your unit; projected net yields 8–11 % p.a.
  5. Capital‑Growth Potential– coastal developments historically appreciate faster than inland assets in the Red Sea region.

Payment Schedule Example

*Amounts vary by unit size; request a personalized quotation.

Why Buy with Hurghadians Property?

  • Local Expertise– 15+ years brokering high‑end Red Sea real estate
  • Transparent Process– legal checks, translation services, and escrow guidance
  • After‑Sales Care– furniture packages, visa support, and resale assistance

Inspired by the relaxed European style, the heavenly development blends with nature, creating colorful experiences around its lively marina and peaceful jetty. Whether you want to recharge or unwind, Somabay has it all. With five luxury resort hotels and a range of residential properties, Somabay offers premium amenities and unforgettable moments with your loved ones.

Prime Location

Design


Majra Resort is a masterpiece of modern design. Its buildings are thoughtfully crafted to maximize sea views and overlook elegant swimming pools. The spacious and luxurious unit layouts are designed to provide the ultimate comfort and sophistication, making every moment at Majra truly exceptional.

Amenities

Facilities

Types of Units

Flexible Payment Plans

property_description:
Welcome to Aqua Infinity Resort, the latest addition to the Aqua Group of exclusive resorts in Hurghada. Situated on the shores of the Red Sea, this modern residential project offers a comfortable and luxurious lifestyle. Let’s explore the key features:

Introduction

Aqua Infinityis a stunning new development in Al Ahyaa, Hurghada—a prime location for those seeking tranquility and convenience. It offers something for everyone, whether you’re looking for a holiday retreat, an investment opportunity, or a permanent residence.

Location

Aqua Infinity Resort in Al Ahyaa, Hurghada, offers a serene seaside experience with urban convenience. Close to Hurghada city center and El Gouna, it provides easy access to essential services, entertainment, and beautiful Red Sea beaches. Just 20 minutes from the airport, the resort is well-connected, making it ideal for both travelers and residents seeking a balanced coastal lifestyle.

Land Area

The resort features a variety of apartments with different sizes and layouts, all offering amazing side views of the sea, pool, or landscaped gardens. Whether you prefer a cozy studio or a spacious two-bedroom unit, Aqua Infinity ensures a delightful living experience.

Units

Choose from the following stylish and cozy units:

  • Studios: Perfect for singles or couples,
  • One-bedroom apartments: Ideal for small families with sea or pool views.
  • Two-Bedroom Apartments: Spacious and comfortable, offering a serene lifestyle.
  • Three-Bedroom Apartments: Generous living spaces for larger families.

Features

  • Sea Views: Most apartments provide stunning side views of the Red Sea.
  • Swimming Pool: Enjoy a large swimming pool within the resort.
  • Roof Terrace: Jacuzzis and sunbeds await on the roof terrace.
  • 24/7 Reception and Security: Feel secure with round-the-clock services.
  • Access to Sister Resort Facilities: Owners can use facilities in the neighboring sister resort, including a supermarket, spa, beauty salon, and gym.

Payment Plans

Choose from the following payment options:

  1. Cash Payment: 40% discount for full cash payment.
  2. Installments: 25% discount with 50% downpayment and 50% installments over 12 months.
  3. Installments: 35% discount with 70% downpayment and 30% installments over 12 months.

Maintenance fees (8% of the property price) are paid upon delivery and every five years thereafter.

Contact Us

For inquiries or to schedule a visit, reach out to Hurghadians Property:

  • Office: +201115582634
  • Mobile/WhatsApp: +201115582634
  • Email:[email protected]

property_description:
iL Bayou Laguna is the newest addition tailored to diverse preferences. Laguna offers an array of exquisite townhouses and twin houses; each graced with a private pool, alongside chalets that command stunning views, ensuring a unique experience for all.

Step into “Laguna,” a serene haven where the soothing elements of nature blend seamlessly. At its heart lies an enchanting, swimmable sandy beach pool—a haven of tranquility. Encircled by soft sandy beaches, the serene lagoon beckons for a rejuvenating swim or a leisurely bask in the sun’s embrace.

“Laguna” extends its charm beyond the picturesque views. It features a specially designed kids’ pool area, a playful sanctuary where children can frolic and enjoy endless aquatic fun.

About iL Bayou

iL Bayou, nestled in the serene beauty of Sahl Hasheesh on the Red Sea, is a fully serviced compound that beckons with its divine tranquility. The success of il Bayou has fueled our passion, leading us to expand and introduce the il Bayou Extension—a celebration of seaside living at its finest.

Property for sale, iL Bayou Laguna

In this new extension, we invite you to immerse yourself in nature, awakening your senses and finding moments of pure relaxation. It’s a haven to escape the daily grind, discover inner peace, and savor simple pleasures. With the beach just 121 meters away, you’ll be closer to the soothing rhythm of the waves.

At TLD, we’re committed to creating a dynamic and unique getaway experience by the sensational Red Sea. Our journey continues, and we look forward to sharing more unforgettable moments with you.

property_title: Blanca Gardens, Soma Bay Apartment 122 sqm for sale
property_description:
Step into the realm of Blanca Gardens, where the whispers of the sea breeze blend with the symphony of waves, creating a sanctuary of serene indulgence amidst the vibrant pulse of Somabay’s White Beach. Here, the development cradles you in its embrace, a secluded treasure nestled in the bay’s heart, where nature’s grandeur spills into your living space, painting every moment with the hues of paradise.

property_title: Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Villa three-bedroom 420 Sqm for sale
property_description:
Bay West Valley, DISCOVER A VALLEY OF ENCHANTMENT—a SERENE HAVEN OF NATURAL BEAUTY.

Nestled between the West Coast of Soma and the scenic Red Sea mountains, the West Valley is a residential oasis with the elegant, soothing architecture of Baywest, surrounded by a stunning valley within walking distance from the peaceful sea of Soma.

Location:

Masterplan:

The SomaBay experience

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Real estate for sale

Enjoy a day of golfing at The Cascades Championship Golf Course, a world-class course designed by Gary Player. Then relax at the Cascades Spa and Thalasso, where the Red Sea’s healing waters will rejuvenate your body and soul. For the thrill-seekers, ORCA Dive Centre offers you a chance to explore the amazing marine life of Egypt’s House Reef. Kitesurfing enthusiasts can have a fun afternoon flying over the flat waters at 7Bft,one of the best kitesurfing spots in the world.Then, treat yourself to a delicious meal at any of the destination’s signature restaurants. With desert winds, low humidity, and stunning sea views, Somabay has something for everyone, turning your everyday life into a dream come true.

Features:

The Somabay Championship Golf Course

Designed by the legendary golfer Gary Player, The Somabay 18-hole, par 72 Championship Golf Course offers a breathtaking 360-degree view of the green golf course, the blue Red Sea, and the brown desert. It is one of the best golf courses in Africa, with a modern academy that excites beginners and experts.

Somabay Hotels

Somabay offers a range of hospitality options to suit every need. Whether you prefer a design-led hotel or a budget-friendly accommodation with impeccable service, you will find your ideal place to stay in this destination. Enjoy the signature treatment and the unforgettable experience all year round in Somabay

  • Sheraton Somabay
  • The Cascades Golf Resort,Spa & Thalasso
  • Robinson Club
  • The Breakers
  • Kempinski Somabay

7 Bft The Kite House

If you love kite surfing, Somabay is the perfect destination for you. It is one of the top 3 spots in the world for this sport, with 365 days of amazing wind and natural beauty. Somabay has a calm bay with clear beaches and ideal wind conditions for off-shore and side-shore surfing.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Home for sale

You can learn from the professional instructors at 7Bft, who will make your kite experience safe, fun, and complete. They also offer exclusive teaching and testing weeks with the latest Naish and Carved equipment. The Kitehouse is a great relaxing place, with fresh food, refreshing cocktails, and a stunning view of the bay from the open terrace.

ORCA Dive Center

Discover the beauty and diversity of Somabay’s underwater world with ORCA Dive Center, the largest and most well-equipped diving center in the Red Sea. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced diver, you will find various dive sites and a colorful House Reef to explore with the guidance and safety of our international team of instructors.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Property for sale

You can access the House Reef easily with our electric cards, which will transport you and your equipment along the 420-meter-long jetty. The House Reef stretches over a kilometer and offers rich marine life and stunning coral formations. ORCA dive center also has a spacious lagoon with calm waters, perfect for training and snorkeling. You can also enjoy our photo and video facilities, which will help you capture your underwater memories.

The Cascades Spa &Thalasso

Experience the ultimate spa journey at ‘The Cascades Spa & Thalasso,’ the most exquisite spa in the Middle East. The spa covers 7,500 m2 of serene space, overlooking the stunning coastline of the Red Sea.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Villa for sale

you can choose from 65 treatment rooms offering various services, from traditional massages and beauty treatments to hydrotherapy and aesthetic procedures. You can also enjoy the healing benefits of the Red Sea in our 830 m2 Thalasso-Tonic hydrotherapy pool, which will help you relax and rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.

Somabay Marina

Somabay’s Marina is the perfect place if you love sailing and sea views. The Marina is a peaceful and beautiful spot where you can dock your boats at a competitive price.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Apartment for sale

You can also enjoy the world-class services and facilities that the Marina offers, such as water, electricity, fuel, security, and more. The Marina is designed to make your sailing experience easy and enjoyable.

S.CAPE Beach

S.CAPE Beach is a hidden gem on Somabay’s coastline, where you can enjoy the tranquility and beauty of a private beach. Whether you want to relax, swim, or sunbathe, you will find a luxurious beachfront setting that will make you feel like you are in paradise. S.CAPE Beach becomes lively at night, with chill-out music, refreshing drinks, and delicious snacks.

property_title: Stone Heights, Apartment one-bedroom 52 sqm for sale
property_description:
Welcome to Stone Heights Hurghada, where modern living meets the serene beauty of the Red Sea. Stone Heights has something to offer whether you’re seeking a holiday home, an investment opportunity, or a permanent residence. Let’s explore the key features:

Introduction

Stone Heights is a new construction project that promises a luxurious lifestyle in one of Egypt’s most popular destinations. With stunning views of the Red Sea and the city, this gated community offers a range of apartment types, from studios to two-bedroom units.

Location

Situated in a prime location, Stone Heights is close to the beach, the marina, and the airport. You’ll easily access Hurghada’s attractions, lifestyle, and amenities. Everything is within reach, from water sports and diving to shopping and dining.

Land Area

The project boasts a spacious outdoor area with a beautiful swimming pool, a garden, and a relaxing terrace where you can soak up the sun. The large windows and balconies in the apartments allow you to enjoy the breathtaking views.

Units

Choose from a variety of fully finished units:

  • Studios: Starting from 34 sqm
  • 1-Bedroom Apartments: Ranging from 45 sqm to 78 sqm
  • 2-Bedroom Apartments: Sizes vary from 77 sqm to 108 sqm

Features

  • Sea Views: Nearly all apartments offer beautiful views of the Red Sea.
  • High-Quality Finishes: Stone Heights uses the best materials and equipment for a modern and elegant design.
  • Community Lifestyle: Stone Heights is more than just an apartment complex; it’s a community of like-minded people who share a passion for the Red Sea lifestyle.
  • Security: Enjoy 24/7 security and surveillance cameras for peace of mind.

Payment Plan

  • Down Payment: 35%
  • Installments: Spread over 2.5 years
  • Delivery Date: 2025

Contact Us

For inquiries or to schedule a visit, please reach out to Hurghadians Property:

  • Office: +201115582634
  • Mobile/WhatsApp: +201115582634
  • Email:[email protected]

property_title: Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Villa two-bedroom 400 Sqm for sale
property_description:
Bay West Valley, DISCOVER A VALLEY OF ENCHANTMENT—a SERENE HAVEN OF NATURAL BEAUTY.

Nestled between the West Coast of Soma and the scenic Red Sea mountains, the West Valley is a residential oasis with the elegant, soothing architecture of Baywest, surrounded by a stunning valley within walking distance from the peaceful sea of Soma.

Location:

Masterplan:

The SomaBay experience

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Real estate for sale

Enjoy a day of golfing at The Cascades Championship Golf Course, a world-class course designed by Gary Player. Then relax at the Cascades Spa and Thalasso, where the Red Sea’s healing waters will rejuvenate your body and soul. For the thrill-seekers, ORCA Dive Centre offers you a chance to explore the amazing marine life of Egypt’s House Reef. Kitesurfing enthusiasts can have a fun afternoon flying over the flat waters at 7Bft,one of the best kitesurfing spots in the world.Then, treat yourself to a delicious meal at any of the destination’s signature restaurants. With desert winds, low humidity, and stunning sea views, Somabay has something for everyone, turning your everyday life into a dream come true.

Features:

The Somabay Championship Golf Course

Designed by the legendary golfer Gary Player, The Somabay 18-hole, par 72 Championship Golf Course offers a breathtaking 360-degree view of the green golf course, the blue Red Sea, and the brown desert. It is one of the best golf courses in Africa, with a modern academy that excites beginners and experts.

Somabay Hotels

Somabay offers a range of hospitality options to suit every need. Whether you prefer a design-led hotel or a budget-friendly accommodation with impeccable service, you will find your ideal place to stay in this destination. Enjoy the signature treatment and the unforgettable experience all year round in Somabay

  • Sheraton Somabay
  • The Cascades Golf Resort,Spa & Thalasso
  • Robinson Club
  • The Breakers
  • Kempinski Somabay

7 Bft The Kite House

If you love kite surfing, Somabay is the perfect destination for you. It is one of the top 3 spots in the world for this sport, with 365 days of amazing wind and natural beauty. Somabay has a calm bay with clear beaches and ideal wind conditions for off-shore and side-shore surfing.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Home for sale

You can learn from the professional instructors at 7Bft, who will make your kite experience safe, fun, and complete. They also offer exclusive teaching and testing weeks with the latest Naish and Carved equipment. The Kitehouse is a great relaxing place, with fresh food, refreshing cocktails, and a stunning view of the bay from the open terrace.

ORCA Dive Center

Discover the beauty and diversity of Somabay’s underwater world with ORCA Dive Center, the largest and most well-equipped diving center in the Red Sea. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced diver, you will find various dive sites and a colorful House Reef to explore with the guidance and safety of our international team of instructors.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Property for sale

You can access the House Reef easily with our electric cards, which will transport you and your equipment along the 420-meter-long jetty. The House Reef stretches over a kilometer and offers rich marine life and stunning coral formations. ORCA dive center also has a spacious lagoon with calm waters, perfect for training and snorkeling. You can also enjoy our photo and video facilities, which will help you capture your underwater memories.

The Cascades Spa &Thalasso

Experience the ultimate spa journey at ‘The Cascades Spa & Thalasso,’ the most exquisite spa in the Middle East. The spa covers 7,500 m2 of serene space, overlooking the stunning coastline of the Red Sea.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Villa for sale

you can choose from 65 treatment rooms offering various services, from traditional massages and beauty treatments to hydrotherapy and aesthetic procedures. You can also enjoy the healing benefits of the Red Sea in our 830 m2 Thalasso-Tonic hydrotherapy pool, which will help you relax and rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.

Somabay Marina

Somabay’s Marina is the perfect place if you love sailing and sea views. The Marina is a peaceful and beautiful spot where you can dock your boats at a competitive price.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Apartment for sale

You can also enjoy the world-class services and facilities that the Marina offers, such as water, electricity, fuel, security, and more. The Marina is designed to make your sailing experience easy and enjoyable.

S.CAPE Beach

S.CAPE Beach is a hidden gem on Somabay’s coastline, where you can enjoy the tranquility and beauty of a private beach. Whether you want to relax, swim, or sunbathe, you will find a luxurious beachfront setting that will make you feel like you are in paradise. S.CAPE Beach becomes lively at night, with chill-out music, refreshing drinks, and delicious snacks.

Nestled between the West Coast of Soma and the scenic Red Sea mountains, the West Valley is a residential oasis with the elegant, soothing architecture of Baywest, surrounded by a stunning valley within walking distance from the peaceful sea of Soma.

Location:

Masterplan:

The SomaBay experience

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Real estate for sale

Enjoy a day of golfing at The Cascades Championship Golf Course, a world-class course designed by Gary Player. Then relax at the Cascades Spa and Thalasso, where the Red Sea’s healing waters will rejuvenate your body and soul. For the thrill-seekers, ORCA Dive Centre offers you a chance to explore the amazing marine life of Egypt’s House Reef. Kitesurfing enthusiasts can have a fun afternoon flying over the flat waters at 7Bft,one of the best kitesurfing spots in the world.Then, treat yourself to a delicious meal at any of the destination’s signature restaurants. With desert winds, low humidity, and stunning sea views, Somabay has something for everyone, turning your everyday life into a dream come true.

Features:

The Somabay Championship Golf Course

Designed by the legendary golfer Gary Player, The Somabay 18-hole, par 72 Championship Golf Course offers a breathtaking 360-degree view of the green golf course, the blue Red Sea, and the brown desert. It is one of the best golf courses in Africa, with a modern academy that excites beginners and experts.

Somabay Hotels

Somabay offers a range of hospitality options to suit every need. Whether you prefer a design-led hotel or a budget-friendly accommodation with impeccable service, you will find your ideal place to stay in this destination. Enjoy the signature treatment and the unforgettable experience all year round in Somabay

  • Sheraton Somabay
  • The Cascades Golf Resort,Spa & Thalasso
  • Robinson Club
  • The Breakers
  • Kempinski Somabay

7 Bft The Kite House

If you love kite surfing, Somabay is the perfect destination for you. It is one of the top 3 spots in the world for this sport, with 365 days of amazing wind and natural beauty. Somabay has a calm bay with clear beaches and ideal wind conditions for off-shore and side-shore surfing.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Home for sale

You can learn from the professional instructors at 7Bft, who will make your kite experience safe, fun, and complete. They also offer exclusive teaching and testing weeks with the latest Naish and Carved equipment. The Kitehouse is a great relaxing place, with fresh food, refreshing cocktails, and a stunning view of the bay from the open terrace.

ORCA Dive Center

Discover the beauty and diversity of Somabay’s underwater world with ORCA Dive Center, the largest and most well-equipped diving center in the Red Sea. Whether you are a beginner or an advanced diver, you will find various dive sites and a colorful House Reef to explore with the guidance and safety of our international team of instructors.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Property for sale

You can access the House Reef easily with our electric cards, which will transport you and your equipment along the 420-meter-long jetty. The House Reef stretches over a kilometer and offers rich marine life and stunning coral formations. ORCA dive center also has a spacious lagoon with calm waters, perfect for training and snorkeling. You can also enjoy our photo and video facilities, which will help you capture your underwater memories.

The Cascades Spa &Thalasso

Experience the ultimate spa journey at ‘The Cascades Spa & Thalasso,’ the most exquisite spa in the Middle East. The spa covers 7,500 m2 of serene space, overlooking the stunning coastline of the Red Sea.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Villa for sale

you can choose from 65 treatment rooms offering various services, from traditional massages and beauty treatments to hydrotherapy and aesthetic procedures. You can also enjoy the healing benefits of the Red Sea in our 830 m2 Thalasso-Tonic hydrotherapy pool, which will help you relax and rejuvenate your mind, body, and soul.

Somabay Marina

Somabay’s Marina is the perfect place if you love sailing and sea views. The Marina is a peaceful and beautiful spot where you can dock your boats at a competitive price.

Bay West Valley, Soma Bay, Apartment for sale

You can also enjoy the world-class services and facilities that the Marina offers, such as water, electricity, fuel, security, and more. The Marina is designed to make your sailing experience easy and enjoyable.

S.CAPE Beach

S.CAPE Beach is a hidden gem on Somabay’s coastline, where you can enjoy the tranquility and beauty of a private beach. Whether you want to relax, swim, or sunbathe, you will find a luxurious beachfront setting that will make you feel like you are in paradise. S.CAPE Beach becomes lively at night, with chill-out music, refreshing drinks, and delicious snacks.

property_title: Aldau Heights, Studio 58 sqm for sale
property_description:
The Project

Aldau Heights is a new residential project that combines luxury, comfort, and convenience in the heart of Hurghada, Egypt. It is located at the beginning of the touristic promenade, just ten minutes away from Hurghada Airport and near the Marina, offering stunning views of the sea and the city.

Aldau Heights is designed with more than 60% open spaces of greenery, water features, and walkways, creating a serene and harmonious environment for its residents. The project features a variety of units, from studios to penthouses, with one, two, or three bedrooms. All units are finished with high-quality German standards and attention to detail and have exceptional views of the sea, the pool, or the promenade.

Aldau Heights also offers a range of amenities and services for its residents, such as a private beach club, a gym, a spa, a kids club, a concierge service, and 24/7 security. The project is connected to Aldau Village Mall, a shopping and entertainment center that includes boutique shops, cafes, restaurants, a pharmacy, a supermarket, and children’s areas. Residents can also enjoy access to the nearby Steigenberger Aldau Beach Hotel and its facilities.

Aldau Heights is more than just a place to live; it is a lifestyle destination that caters to your every need and desire. Whether you are looking for a permanent home, a holiday retreat, or an investment opportunity, Aldau Heights is the perfect choice for you. Don’t miss this chance to own your dream home in one of the most sought-after locations in Hurghada.

Aldau Heights, Hurghada

Our residential units have modern and practical designs. They range from studios to penthouses, with one, two, or three bedrooms. They are all finished with high-quality German standards and attention to detail. Most of the units have a sea, pool, or promenade view.

ALDAU VILLAGE MALL

ALDAU VILLAGE MALL is a shopping and entertainment center in Hurghada, Egypt. It is part of the ALDAU Development project, which also includes residential and hotel complexes. The mall offers a variety of local and international brands, cafes, restaurants, a pharmacy, a supermarket, and children’s areas. It is located near the beach and the touristic promenade.

property_title: Aqua Infinity Resort, Apartment Two-Bedrooms For Sale 68m2
property_description:
Aqua Infinity Resort: Your Oasis by the Red Sea

Welcome to Aqua Infinity Resort, the latest addition to the Aqua Group of exclusive resorts in Hurghada. Situated on the shores of the Red Sea, this modern residential project offers a comfortable and luxurious lifestyle. Let’s explore the key features:

Introduction

Aqua Infinity is a stunning new development in Al Ahyaa, Hurghada—a prime location for those seeking tranquility and convenience. It offers something for everyone, whether you’re looking for a holiday retreat, an investment opportunity, or a permanent residence.

Location

Aqua Infinity Resort in Al Ahyaa, Hurghada, offers a serene seaside experience with urban convenience. Close to Hurghada city center and El Gouna, it provides easy access to essential services, entertainment, and beautiful Red Sea beaches. Just 20 minutes from the airport, the resort is well-connected, making it ideal for both travelers and residents seeking a balanced coastal lifestyle.

Land Area

The resort features a variety of apartments with different sizes and layouts, all offering amazing side views of the sea, pool, or landscaped gardens. Whether you prefer a cozy studio or a spacious two-bedroom unit, Aqua Infinity ensures a delightful living experience.

Units

Choose from the following stylish and cozy units:

  • Studios: Perfect for singles or couples,
  • One-bedroom apartments: Ideal for small families with sea or pool views.
  • Two-Bedroom Apartments: Spacious and comfortable, offering a serene lifestyle.
  • Three-Bedroom Apartments: Generous living spaces for larger families.

Features

  • Sea Views: Most apartments provide stunning side views of the Red Sea.
  • Swimming Pool: Enjoy a large swimming pool within the resort.
  • Roof Terrace: Jacuzzis and sunbeds await on the roof terrace.
  • 24/7 Reception and Security: Feel secure with round-the-clock services.
  • Access to Sister Resort Facilities: Owners can use facilities in the neighboring sister resort, including a supermarket, spa, beauty salon, and gym.

Payment Plans

Choose from the following payment options:

  1. Cash Payment: 40% discount for full cash payment.
  2. Installments: 25% discount with 50% downpayment and 50% installments over 12 months.
  3. Installments: 35% discount with 70% downpayment and 30% installments over 12 months.

Maintenance fees (8% of the property price) are paid upon delivery and every five years thereafter.

Contact Us

For inquiries or to schedule a visit, reach out to Hurghadians Property:

  • Office: +201115582634
  • Mobile/WhatsApp: +201115582634
  • Email:[email protected]
